00066 #define CHIPMUNK_ARBITER_GET_SHAPES(arb, a, b) ChipmunkShape *a, *b; { \
00067   cpShape *shapeA, *shapeB; \
00068   cpArbiterGetShapes(arb, &shapeA, &shapeB); \
00069   a = shapeA->data; b = shapeB->data; \
00070 }

00113 // TODO these might be a really bad idea as they will not call subclass methods.
00114 // The following two methods use the [shape data] object as the collision handler.
00115 // In order to cache the method lookups, it needs to know the class of the object.
00116 // This means that [shape data] objects _must_ be an instance of klass.
00117 // See OneWay.m for an example.
00118
